channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- NetWeaver AS for ABAP and ABAP Platform (SAPRSBRO Program)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- NetWeaver AS for ABAP and ABAP Platform (SAPRSBRO Program)

item.title: CVE-2023-27500|2024-08-02T12:16:35.333Z -- sap -- netweaver%20as%20for%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform%20%28saprsbro%20program%29
item.description: An attacker with non-administrative authorizations can exploit a directory traversal flaw in program SAPRSBRO to over-write system files. In this attack, no data can be read but potentially critical OS files can be over-written making the system unavailable.
